name: Metaplane
headline: Data observability for modern data teams
description:
Metaplane ensures everyone trusts the data that powers your business. Data teams at Bose, Ramp, and Klaviyo use our data observability platform to prevent and detect data issues — before the CEO pings them about weird revenue numbers.

We do this with ML-based anomaly detection, end-to-end column-level lineage, and tools to help prevent incidents before they occur. You can monitor your entire data stack within 30 minutes.

The company is backed by Khosla Ventures, Y Combinator, and the founders of Okta, HubSpot, and Vercel.

## Built for enterprise scale and security
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/66abf7f549c4cae9b2e1f50d_marc%20sloope.jpg)
Marc Sloope
Head of Analytics
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/66abf8087c0b7ff8d5589fe6_bose.svg)
### At Bose, we're trying to raise awareness of data quality—which is what Metaplane does best.
We're managing terabytes of data being used throughout the organization. As the owner of analytics engineering, I'm looking at product data, enterprise data, marketing data, and sales data. It's just so wide. That's where Metaplane allows us to understand the hiccups and possible hiccups.
### SOC 2 Type II
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/66a129d6ae05114c737aefd8_soc2.svg)
Metaplane is designed to store no sensitive customer data. SOC 2 report and Data Process Addendum available upon request.
### GDPR / CCPA
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/66a12a129a34830dea3db0c6_gdpr.png)
Data privacy is critical — Metaplane complies with the latest major privacy standards
### HIPAA compliant
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/66a12a12996864fa6e1a5407_hipaa.png)
Healthcare companies use Metaplane with confidence. Sensitive customer data never leaves their source.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/66a3c44a44992c59edfaad6e_philip.png)
Philip K.
Analytics Engineer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/659d4c53ffc2b68b844455ef_mux.svg)
### Hard to imagine life without Metaplane
Metaplane solves data observability AND makes it something that a wider team of non-Data Engineers can engage with and understand.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/66a3c44a5aed52929d3e25cf_marion.png)
Philip K.
Analytics Engineer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/659d4c53ffc2b68b844455ef_mux.svg)
### Metaplane has everything I need in one place. It gives me full visibility into the quality and performance of my data.
With Metaplane, more than 80% of alerts are legitimate issues that require my attention. The product speaks for itself. If something breaks, you’ll know.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/66a3c3ba7a93a529386963c0_ian.png)
Philip K.
Analytics Engineer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6010c8c1dcb1d8def7311218/66a13cd101797777657cff14_ramp.png)
### Strong founding team, strong user empathy, great product!
Our data team has many aggregations that are production grade outputs. We can't write determinstic tests on everything, we need some sense of stateful anomaly detection (i.e. this is wrong based on what it used to look like). generated_description:
### Metaplane: Your Partner in Data Observability

**Overview**  
Founded in the Winter of 2020 as part of Y Combinator's Batch W20, Metaplane is a Boston-based tech startup that specializes in data observability—a critical area for modern data teams. With a small team of 12 and a clear mission, they ensure that data-driven businesses can trust the data that fuels their decisions. Their clients include notable brands like Bose, Ramp, and Klaviyo.

**Mission**  
Metaplane's core mission is to provide data observability solutions that empower modern data teams to prevent, detect, and resolve data issues before they escalate to higher management. In other words, they aim to avoid awkward conversations with the CEO about unusual revenue figures.

**Key Features**  
Metaplane utilizes advanced machine learning for anomaly detection, offering features such as:
- **End-to-end column-level lineage**: Get complete visibility into your data flow—from source to usage.
- **Proactive incident prevention**: Tools that help anticipate and neutralize data quality issues well in advance.
- **Quick setup**: You can monitor your entire data stack in just about 30 minutes.

Their platform encompasses a range of capabilities including:
- **Data quality monitoring**
- **Schema change alerts**
- **Pipeline monitoring**
- **Automated incident management**

**Team & Partners**  
Backed by notable investors like Khosla Ventures, Y Combinator, and industry founders from Okta, HubSpot, and Vercel, Metaplane is a growing player in the data engineering landscape. Their partnerships and integrations with popular data services like Snowflake, BigQuery, and Databricks enhance their offerings.

**Integrations**  
Metaplane provides seamless integration with a variety of tools:
- Data warehouses: Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift, and more.
- Ingestion tools: Airbyte, Fivetran.
- BI platforms: Looker, Tableau, and others.
  
These integrations simplify the setup process and enhance the monitoring experience for users.

**What’s Next?**  
Metaplane is constantly evolving its platform, introducing features such as a Snowflake Native App and continuous enhancements based on user feedback. They are committed to building a solution that not only fits technical needs but is also intuitive enough for non-technical team members to understand and engage with.

**Conclusion**  
In a world where data drives decisions, having a trustworthy observability platform is not just a luxury—it's essential. Metaplane stands out with its user-friendly interface and powerful features that help teams regain trust in their data, setting the stage for informed decision-making. If you're looking to level up your data operations, Metaplane is worth a look.

For more details, check out their website at [metaplane.dev](https://metaplane.dev).
